title: 五级试试发锭看看能不能发！
author: 幽儿~
txt_content:
"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: CNFMC蔡锡晨
replies.txt_content:
标题: 五级试试发锭看看能不能发！
对，本dalao五级啦，试试发锭。几率中等，看谁运气好吧……

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
额，发锭的都是大佬 2333





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
几率必须100%
水贴不能因发锭而提升价值



--------“支配与被支配的人，是否会心生恨意？

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
取消了也没用，还是水帖




--------“支配与被支配的人，是否会心生恨意？

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
zyjking 发表于 2016-10-24 19:25
几率要设置成100％，要保证每一楼都有相同数量的锭
既然你都这样说了 那吐出来吧 【有福利哦 2333XD】
